#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonized variable from the study-specific variables they has to be recoded as follows:

First of all: 

* `recode 2,3 into 2`
* `reocde -1, -2 into NA`

Secondly, 

* `if any of the variables is equal to 2 recode proxy = 1`
* `otherwise proxy = 0`
* `unless all the variables are missing values `

**R script:**


```{r harmo1, echo=TRUE}
SHARE_proxy$hh014_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$hh014_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$ho041_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$ho041_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$ft021_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$ft021_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$sp022_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$sp022_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$ch023_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$ch023_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$ep210_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$ep210_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$hc063_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$hc063_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$br017_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$br017_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$ph054_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$ph054_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$dn038_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$dn038_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$as057_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$as057_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$co009_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$co009_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")

SHARE_proxy$have2 <- apply(SHARE_proxy[,-1], MARGIN = 1, FUN = function(x) sum(x==2, na.rm = TRUE)>=1)
SHARE_proxy$nmis <- apply(SHARE_proxy[,-1], MARGIN = 1, FUN = function(x) sum(is.na(x)))

SHARE_ds_w1 <- tibble(id=SHARE_proxy$id)
SHARE_ds_w1$proxy <- 0
SHARE_ds_w1$proxy[SHARE_proxy$have2] <- 1
SHARE_ds_w1$proxy[SHARE_proxy$nmis==12] <- 999
SHARE_ds_w1$proxy <- labelled(SHARE_ds_w1$proxy, labels = cat_label)
label(SHARE_ds_w1$proxy) <- ds_label_all
```

#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript1, echo=FALSE}
vari <- SHARE_ds_w1$proxy
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3], caption = ds_label) 
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Type of missing")
ggplot(SHARE_ds_w1, aes(x=factor(proxy))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label) + ylab("Frequency")
```
 
 

 
```{r importOPAL1, echo=FALSE}
proxy <- SHARE_ds_w1
save(proxy, file = "../RData/w1/proxy.RData")
rm(SHARE_dep, proxy)
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonized variable from the study-specific variables they has to be recoded as follows:

First of all: 

* `recode 2,3 into 2`
* `reocde -1, -2 into NA`

Secondly, 

* `if any of the variables is equal to 2 recode proxy = 1`
* `otherwise proxy = 0`
* `unless all the variables are missing values `

**R script:**

```{r harmo2, echo=TRUE}
SHARE_proxy$hh014_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$hh014_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$ho041_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$ho041_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$ft021_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$ft021_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$sp022_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$sp022_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$ch023_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$ch023_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$ep210_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$ep210_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$hc063_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$hc063_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$br017_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$br017_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$ph054_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$ph054_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$dn038_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$dn038_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$as057_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$as057_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")
SHARE_proxy$co009_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$co009_, "2:3=2; -2:-1=NA")

SHARE_proxy$have2 <- apply(SHARE_proxy[,-1], MARGIN = 1, FUN = function(x) sum(x==2, na.rm = TRUE)>=1)
SHARE_proxy$nmis <- apply(SHARE_proxy[,-1], MARGIN = 1, FUN = function(x) sum(is.na(x)))

SHARE_ds_w2 <- tibble(id=SHARE_proxy$id)
SHARE_ds_w2$proxy <- 0
SHARE_ds_w2$proxy[SHARE_proxy$have2] <- 1
SHARE_ds_w2$proxy[SHARE_proxy$nmis==12] <- 999
SHARE_ds_w2$proxy <- labelled(SHARE_ds_w2$proxy, labels = cat_label)
label(SHARE_ds_w2$proxy) <- ds_label_all
```

#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript2, echo=FALSE}

kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3], caption = ds_label) 
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Type of missing")
ggplot(SHARE_ds_w2, aes(x=factor(proxy))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label) + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonized variable from the study-specific variables they has to be recoded as follows:

First of all: 

* `recode 2,3 into 2`
* `reocde -1, -2 into NA`

Secondly, 

* `if any of the variables is equal to 2 recode proxy = 1`
* `otherwise proxy = 0`
* `unless all the variables are missing values `

**R script:**

```{r harmo5, echo=TRUE}
SHARE_proxy$hh014_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$hh014_, "2:3=2")
SHARE_proxy$ho041_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$ho041_, "2:3=2")
SHARE_proxy$ft021_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$ft021_, "2:3=2")
SHARE_proxy$sp022_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$sp022_, "2:3=2")
SHARE_proxy$ch023_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$ch023_, "2:3=2")
SHARE_proxy$ep210_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$ep210_, "2:3=2")
SHARE_proxy$br017_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$br017_, "2:3=2")
SHARE_proxy$ph054_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$ph054_, "2:3=2")
SHARE_proxy$as057_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$as057_, "2:3=2")
SHARE_proxy$co009_ <- car::recode(SHARE_proxy$co009_, "2:3=2")

SHARE_proxy$have2 <- apply(SHARE_proxy[,-1], MARGIN = 1, FUN = function(x) sum(x==2, na.rm = TRUE)>=1)
SHARE_proxy$nmis <- apply(SHARE_proxy[,-1], MARGIN = 1, FUN = function(x) sum(is.na(x)))

SHARE_ds_w5 <- tibble(id=SHARE_proxy$id)
SHARE_ds_w5$proxy <- 0
SHARE_ds_w5$proxy[SHARE_proxy$have2] <- 1
SHARE_ds_w5$proxy[SHARE_proxy$nmis==10] <- 999
SHARE_ds_w5$proxy <- labelled(SHARE_ds_w5$proxy, labels = cat_label)
label(SHARE_ds_w5$proxy) <- ds_label_all
```

#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript5, echo=FALSE}
vari <- SHARE_ds_w5$proxy
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3], caption = ds_label) 
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Type of missing")
ggplot(SHARE_ds_w5, aes(x=factor(proxy))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label) + ylab("Frequency")
```
